main event: A series of reports involving unidentified flying objects and possible fragments were investigated by Project Blue Book from various witnesses in Missoula and Martinsdale, Montana, in December 1956.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing a black-grey colored rock-like object with a self-supporting power source,The object's shape was described as disc-like or elliptical,Multiple witnesses corroborated the sighting, and various descriptions were provided,The object was suggested to be possibly volcanic in origin, and many locals believed the object resembled a rock rather than a traditional aircraft.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object resembling a black-grey rock or fragment
witness description: Various witnesses, including locals such as a post office employee and a hotel proprietor, provided details about the sighting.
